text: The owner is a seriously talented pastry chef. He made an outstanding strawberry cheese cake for us on short notice. Everyone raved about it. This place is a rare gem.

I visited this place in the summer and it was amazing. Their croissant sandwiches are incredible and so are their desserts. The owner is incredibly friendly! So, so lovely. Great addition to the Oakville area!
Desserts are excellent. They offer cakes and cookies but their macarons are a must try.
